200.description: Returns the information of the currently logged user
Returns the list of active extensions based on the scope provided with the query parameters

parameters.description: determines whether the service account should be "virtually" removed, if so the link between the extension and service account will be removed while the service account will remain accessible from the IAM
parameters.name: virtualServiceAccountDelete

parameters.description: `true`: include visibilities and proxies in the response. `false` only extension data is returned. default value is `false`.
parameters.name: resolveDetails

200.description: Returns the list of activated extension ids

parameters.description: determines whether the service account should be "virtually" removed, if so the link between the extension and service account will be removed while the service account will remain accessible from the IAM
parameters.name: virtual
availableTo
parameters.description: A comma-separated string of possible item visibilities: "public", "all-tenants", "private". It is mutually exclusive with "includeTenantId"

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: A comma-separated string of possible item categories

parameters.name: includeTenantId
parameters.description: The Id of the Tenant for which to return both the public and private marketplace resources. It is mutually exclusive with "availableTo"

parameters.name: itemUrns
parameters.description: List of item URNs used to fetch only specific items, where the URN pattern is `urn:<<tenantId>>:mktp:<<itemId>>`, or `urn:<<tenantId>>:mktp:<<itemId>>?=version=<<version>>`. Each list element should be passed on a different query param (ie. itemUrns=urn1&itemUrns=urn2)

parameters.name: lifecycleStatus
parameters.description: A comma-separated string of possible item release stages: "coming-soon", "draft", "published", "maintenance", "deprecated", "archived"

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Regex for filtering items by name

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of items per page. **Deprecated in favor of `perPage`**

parameters.name: resolveResourcesData
parameters.description: If true the returned items contain also the resources data as well as metadata

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The field to which sort results. Default sort is ascending, for descending order add a "-" before the field (e.g. -name).

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: The Id of the Tenant for which to filter the marketplace resources

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: A comma separated string of marketplace types (e.g.: plugin,template,example,application)

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of items per page. **Deprecated in favor of `perPage`**

X-Marketplace-Item-Latest-Version.description: URN of the new latest version

patch.description: Patches the metadata of a specific Marketplace item version

comingSoon.description: Flag that will prevent the use of the item

imageUrl.description: Url of the image associated with the item

itemId.description: RFC-1035 compliant identifier of the item. It forms a composite PK with tenantId and, if present, version.name

providerId.description: Identifier of the provider used to retrieve markdown documentation content and external resources, if supported by the item type

publishOnMiaDocumentation.description: Flag stating if the resource documentation should be published on Mia-Platform public documentation

repositoryUrl.description: URL of the repository containing the source code of the resource created by the item

supportedBy.description: Identifier of the company that has produced the item

supportedByImageUrl.description: Url of the image associated with the company that has produced the item

tenantId.description: Identifier of the tenant to which the item belongs. It forms a composite PK with itemId and, if present, version.name

version.description: Version of the item following semver

security.description: Flag stating if the version addresses any vulnerability

allTenants.description: If true, the item will be accessible to all companies

public.description: If true, the item will be accessible from any user that access the Console, even if not authenticated

public.description: If true, the item will be accessible from any user that access the Console, even if not authenticated
